en.title: H.E President of the Philippines Gloria Macapagal Arroyo Proudly Wearing FE's QP on the Beach!
en.content: The Philippine Star Newspaper headline photo showing H.E President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo proudly wearing FE's Quantum Pendant while walking on the beach of Mindoro with government officials!
